itunes:summary:
YouTube children's entertainer (and fellow Drinkin' Bro) Cowboy Jack joins the show to talk about how and why he got into kid's entertainment, why he chose to be a cowboy character, how he and his wife taught themselves to do video production, and where he wants to take the character from here.
